Description: Sherd of East Greek (?) flat-based pottery open vessel; glazed except for a reserved band at outside of underside; inscription cut on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of the Dioskouroi (Naukratis), Found in the area between the sanctuaries of the Dioskouroi and Apollo (see Petrie 1886, 16)
Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), Found in the area between the sanctuaries of the Dioskouroi and Apollo (see Petrie 1886, 16)
Curator's comments: For a similar piece see 1965,0930.668, which could well be from the same pot cif the inscription ends with 'Samihs'
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 16, pl. XXXV, no. 689)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 318)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.971)
